DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if 8 weeks of Daclatasvir plus Sofosbuvir with or without Ribavirin is safe and effective in the treatment of genotype 3 hepatitis C infected patients without advanced fibrosis or liver cirrhosis who have never been treated previously.
